column3: not worth the wait of ~2 hours. They have good food
column4: but it can be very heavy (especially the pancakes) because they put a TON of butter
column6: and sugar in their sweet dishes. I enjoyed the omelette
column7: but found it to be comparable to other restaurants that don't have long waits (I love you
column8: Canopy!). The first time I went
column9: there was a table open for 20 minutes before I was allowed to sit down
column10: and they definitely just let the phone ring without answering (minus one star for service). I've gone again a few months later
column11: and their operations have gotten more efficient
column12: but still an ongoing challenge the staff will need to address.
